plant.question: I have a big, round face and wear a green coat. Rabbits love to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow underground.
🧡 I'm often orange.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me!

plant.question: I am tall and green with a strong trunk and many branches. Birds like to build their homes in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am a seed that pops into a fluffy white treat when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I come from a tall plant.
🍿 I taste good with butter.
🎬 People eat me at the cinema.

plant.question: I have thorns, but beautiful, colorful petals. People give me to show they care. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, pink, or white.
💐 You might find me in a vase.
🖐️ Be careful of my pointy parts!

plant.question: I am long, green and grow on vines. I'm crunchy and make a tasty pickle. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I'm a type of gourd.
🥪 I taste good in salads and sandwiches.
🧂 You can soak me in salty vinegar.

plant.question: I am a very tall plant, with thick stalks and yellow kernels inside. You can grind me to make flour. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I'm often grown in big fields.
🚜 Farmers harvest me in the fall.
🌮 Tortillas are made from me.

plant.question: I am a plant that climbs and wraps around things. I can make you itch if you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I have three leaves.
⚠️ You should stay away from me in the woods.
🤧 I can cause a rash.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches on a vine. I can be green, red, or purple, and some are used to make juice. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am small and round.
🍷 Some people make wine from me.
🧺 You can buy me at a farmer's market.

plant.question: I am a plant with a big brown stalk, surrounded by many layers that make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell.
🍳 I make food taste better.
😭 Chopping me might make you sad.

plant.question: I am a plant that grows from a bulb. I have a long, green stalk and a bright, colorful head that opens up to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I am a popular flower in the springtime.
💐 People give bouquets of me for special occasions.
💐 I am a classic spring flower.

food.question: I am yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 I am the same color as the sun.
🌱 I grow on trees.

food.question: I am round and juicy. I can be red, green, or yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I'm a popular fruit.
🥧 People make pies out of me.
🐛 A worm likes to eat me sometimes.

food.question: I am long and orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a vegetable.
🐇 Bugs Bunny loves to munch on me.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyes.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me with cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am a liquid.
🐄 Calves drink me from their mothers.
🦴 I make your bones strong.

food.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am often used to make juice.
🍷 Grown-ups sometimes make wine from me.
🧺 I grow on vines.

food.question: I am a yummy treat that comes in many flavors and am often served cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🍨 You eat me with a spoon.
🍦 I am often served in a cone.
☀️ I'm a nice treat on a hot day.

food.question: I am made of dough, covered in sauce and cheese, and baked in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am often cut into triangles.
🚚 You can order me for delivery.
🍅 I have tomato sauce.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and sweet green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have little black seeds inside.
🇨🇳 I originated from China.
💪 I am a good source of Vitamin C.

food.question: I am a vegetable that looks like a tiny tree. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 I am green.
🌳 I look like a mini forest.
🔥 You can roast me in the oven.

food.question: I am a food made from fermented soybeans. I can be firm or soft, and I am often eaten by vegetarians. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a good source of protein.
🇯🇵 I'm popular in Asian cuisine.
🥣 I can be used in stir-fries and soups.
